project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Implement API call to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the JSON response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement user input handling to enter the city name
Display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure functionality
